    • IPricingSheet

    Interface IPricingSheet<Calculation>

    interface IPricingSheet<Calculation extends PricingCalculation> {
        addDiscount: (
            params: { amount: number; discountId: string; meta?: any },
        ) => void;
        calculation: Calculation[];
        currencyCode?: string;
        discountPrices: (discountId?: string) => PricingDiscount[];
        filterBy: (filter?: Partial<Calculation>) => Calculation[];
        getRawPricingSheet: () => Calculation[];
        gross: () => number;
        isValid: () => boolean;
        net: () => number;
        quantity?: number;
        resetCalculation: (
            sheetToInvert: IBasePricingSheet<Calculation>,
        ) => Calculation[];
        sum: (filter?: Partial<Calculation>) => number;
        taxSum: (filter?: Partial<Calculation>) => number;
        total: (
            params?: {
                category?: string;
                discountId?: string;
                useNetPrice?: boolean;
            },
        ) => { amount: number; currencyCode: string };
    }

    Type Parameters

    • Calculation extends PricingCalculation
